title: Case-Based Mathematical Problem Solving Utilizing IoT Cognitive Technology (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (statistics, probability) and foundational IoT terminology understanding
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods to solve complex IoT cognitive problems with mathematical approaches through case-based learning in a limited technological environment (primarily smartphones)

learning_goals: Explain methods to analyze and interpret uncertain information in IoT perception processes using statistical techniques
Design problem-solving procedures by applying mathematical modeling based on real-world livestock IoT system cases
Learners can practice collecting and processing IoT-aware data using smartphone-based tools in a limited technological environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
